download_desc: Downloads the diagnostics file to your computer.
upload_desc: Sends the diagnostics file to the plugin author. Once the file has been sent, an identifier will be displayed. Include the identifier when requesting support.

metrics.desc: Allows collection of usage data. This sends an anonymized identifier, the current Unraid version, the current version of the plugin, and the enabled/disabled status of some features. No personal or network information is collected.
